text: You've got to take risks and I'm sure you've probably heard that before.
I'm sure the store is open.
I'm sure you've all searched for your favorite video on YouTube.com.
I'm convinced that the only thing that kept me going was that I loved what I did.
Now it's our turn to take that torch. I'm convinced we'll do it.
Though you're acting strange, you are certainly my son.
Watch for this formula in books, movies and TV shows you come across. You will certainly see it again.
You're absolutely Alice, I'd know you anywhere.
It gets us into the Chinese market for 600,000. I think it's absolutely the right thing to do.
It sure looks like snow today.
